column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Robyn - Thank you for the stars. We greatly appreciate it. I'm glad you're able to get your workout on
column2: and get some ramen in the same trip! And since our company originated in Los Angeles
column3: it's especially pleasing to know that our ramen stacks up to the quality of ramen you used to get in California. We appreciate your business
column4: and we hope you'll visit us again soon!
